# React Hooks

[[HOC]]

# Awesome

# Tools

  • hook-into-props Helper to build HOCs using hooks. Useful for using hooks with class components.
  • Jooks Unit-test your custom hooks by mocking React's Hooks API (useState, etc.)
  • react-hooks-testing-library Library to create unit tests for custom React hooks.

# Catalogs

  • @umijs/hooks(ğŸš) A collection of React Hooks specifically aiming at enterprise applications.
  • Captain hook Modest list of hooks.

# Packages

  • use-immer A hook to use immer to manipulate state.
